title: 'Boys and Girl - Dak's Shoulder; Offensive Philosophy; Eagles Preview with NFL Network's Mike Garafolo and Orlando Scandrick
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Dak's Shoulder; Offensive Philosophy; Eagles Preview with NFL Network's Mike Garafolo and Orlando Scandrick
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby share the latest thoughts from the locker room on Dak Prescott’s shoulder injury. Plus, Mike Garafolo from NFL Network stops by to preview the Eagles. Also: former Cowboys and Eagles cornerback Orlando Scandrick stops by. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
